instruction.value: Apply a small ribbon of ointment to the LEFT eye conjuctival sac.
Apply a small ribbon of ointment to the RIGHT eye conjuctival sac.
Apply a small ribbon of ointment to the affected eye(s) conjuctival sac.
Apply a small ribbon of ointment to conjuctival sac of BOTH eyes.
Apply to the conjunctival sac of each eye during night.
